title: Maus0728
author: Maus0728
content: Heya!I was wondering if there is a specific career roadmap in cybersecurity that is related to Web3 or cryptocurrency in general. I mean, with the introduction of blockchain technology, it's kind of difficult to think about how cybersecurity will contribute to mitigating threats presented in blockchain since it is immutable by itself.As for my background, aside from my hobbies in digital arts, I am a graduating student taking a 4-year computer-related course, and I have decided to pursue a career in cybersecurity, which I know is a vast and difficult field, especially when finding an entry-level job. Since I am also interested in Bitcoin, I think pursuing a cybersecurity career closely related to Web3 applications or crypto, in general, is a good idea. I am currently taking the newest Google Cybersecurity Certification, though!Any input would be appreciated!

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: Quote from: Maus0728 on June 07, 2023, 06:38:17 AMI was wondering if there is a specific career roadmap in cybersecurity that is related to Web3 or cryptocurrency in general.One of the best decision to make in this era is to learn on how to improve yourself in diverse areas of this current and advanced digital world and technology, first by learning bitcoin, there are many opportunities that comes in this alone because you will stand out having the full knowledge about the bitcoin network in cryptocurrency because everything now is rotating round the digital financial economy system, you could also create more time to develop some additional technical skills like learning about java script, programming, coding, blockchain technology and many more areas on these same technology.

comments.author: Ebico
comments.body: The entire world has existed in different phases. The first and second phase being the Agricultural and Industrial phase. And now we are in the information age. The information age is characterised with all the qualities of the digital world of which block chain is one of such. So I can assuredly say to you that you are on the right track because there is indeed a career in crypto currency as it relates with cyber security.
